sentences.en: Her face was careworn with anxiety.
sentences.cn: 她脸上一副焦虑万分的神情。

sentences.en: It's sad to see the careworn face of the mother of a large poor family.
sentences.cn: 看到那贫穷的一大家子的母亲忧劳憔悴的脸庞心里真是难受.

sentences.en: Taken by Alexander Gardner in 1865, the picture reveals a contemplative Lincoln, evidently exhausted and careworn.
sentences.cn: 这幅照片是由加德纳(AlexanderGardner)在1865年拍摄的, 照片中的林肯目光沉思, 显得疲惫不堪、忧心忡忡.

sentences.en: The old woman had a careworn look on her face.
sentences.cn: 老妇脸上露出忧心忡忡的神色.

sentences.en: With human and divine pity Jesus looked into her sorrowful , careworn face.
sentences.cn: 耶稣以人的同情和上帝的慈怜望著马大忧愁憔悴的脸.

words.tran_cn: 忧心忡忡的；饱经忧患的；疲倦的
